channel.description: Recent content in Switzerland on DDoSecrets Wiki

item.title: Mining Secrets
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE Mining Secrets Over 4 terabytes of files and emails from the Swiss-registered mining and investment consortium Solway and its Guatemalan subsidiaries Pronico and CGN. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRIES Guatemala, Russia, Switzerland TYPE Hack SOURCE Guacamaya FILE SIZE 4.2 TB DOWNLOADS (How to Download) MAGNET Mail, Files TORRENT Mail, Files DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES Forbidden Stories (en) Forbidden Stories (es) Forbidden Stories (fr),Guacamaya statement EDITOR NOTES A video of the hack was sent to Enlace Hacktivista and can be seen here Over 4 terabytes of files and emails from the Swiss-registered mining and investment consortium Solway and its Guatemalan subsidiaries Pronico and CGN.
